Text: Thank you for each of these uploads, ma'am.  As a fan of Tarzan for most of my life, it's interesting to see him portrayed in the current day.

You're welcome.  It is nice to read and see how authors and artists can re-imagine a story in different ways.   One example is how Oz is re-told in so many different ways - Big Dog Ink's The Legend of Oz - The Wicked West, Image's No Place Like Home, Antarctic Press's Oz - The Manga, Image's The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, and finally my favorite - Eric Shanower's The Wonderful World of Oz and its sequels by Marvel.

A great example is what Zenescope has done with the Grimm Fairy Tales series.
kentcave, give me a couple of days and I'll be able to upload Arak, Son of Thunder1-50 + the Annual.
